text.english: The king shall have joy in Your strength, O LORD; And in Your salvation how greatly shall he rejoice! You have given him his heart's desire, And have not withheld the request of his lips.Selah
text.arabic: يَا رَبُّ بِقُوَّتِكَ يَفْرَحُ الْمَلِكُ وَبِخَلاَصِكَ كَيْفَ لاَ يَبْتَهِجُ جِدّاً! شَهْوَةَ قَلْبِهِ أَعْطَيْتَهُ وَمُلْتَمَسَ شَفَتَيْهِ لَمْ تَمْنَعْهُ. سِلاَهْ.
